ygData.subject: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, he did say giving druids better tracking than bards would devalue rangers.  Nary a word about devaluing bards. ... -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 21 Dec 1999, Wayne Sheppard wrote:
>
> How is this evidence of "bard hate" at all? Gordon said two things:
> 1. Druids won't be able to track better than Bards.
> 2. Bard's tracking cap is too high, but won't be changed (i.e. No Nerf).
>
> If you think this is an example of "bard hate" then I'd think you are too
> paranoid and just looking for any chance to slam Verant.

Well, he did say giving druids better tracking than bards
would devalue rangers. Nary a word about devaluing bards.
:(
